divs: Sighting Detailswas taking my daughter home ,elizabeth pa, roughly 2pm. we noticed a rainbow that appeared to touch the ground right in the valley about a hundred yards from the road. i suggested to my daughter (she was nine then) that if we ran down through the field , we might be surrounded by colors , and maybe even find a pot of gold. well the grass was way to tall and wet , so i suggested we just take a picture instead. i grabbed my disposable camera, and since i couldnt fit the whole rainbow in one shot , i took the right half first, and trying very hard to line it up right , i panned left and as i did i saw something in the sky come into view through the lens. i didnt want to lose my lineup , so i snapped the picture, then pulled the camera away and saw a dark object hovering. i turned to tell my daughter to look , and when i turned back it was gone, but she did see it to , cuz when i turned to her she was already looking at it strangely. she asked what it was , and after a moments thought, i figured it best to reply "probably just a hawk, or somethin." it was NOT a hawk. i am an avid bird watcher, and ive never seen a hawk just dissapear....got the pics developed , and here ya go. hawk ?
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Elizabeth
There were no other sightings in Elizabeth on or around September 15th 1999
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: was taking photo of rainbow , saw something enter frame , snapped pic.
